ovdesc.p: This Application is used to setup the default sorting order for Limit and collateral allocation

desc.p: SYSTEM - Input can be defined from MASTER company only.
A Valid Customer company (CUS.COMPANY must be same as ID of the company).
Field to define the Giving Priority. Based on this setup Limits covered by a collateral right will be sorted during collateral allocation.
1 - Own liabilities are covered first and allocations are sorted in ascending order.
2 - Own liabilities are covered first and allocations are sorted in descending order.
Receiving priority order, Based on this setup collateral rights used to cover a liability will be sorted and utilised based on the sorted order.
1 - Own liabilities are covered first and allocations are sorted in ascending order.
2 - Own liabilities are covered first and allocations are sorted in descending order.
This field is used to specify the order by which collateral should be sorted.
1 – ASSET TYPE - COLLATERAL.RIGHT received will be sorted by Asset first.
When more than one asset of same type from different customers, then it will be further sorted by Customer key.
The sorting can be set to sort largest to smallest or vice versa.
2 – CUSTOMER - COLLATERAL.RIGHT received will be sorted by Customer first.
When there are multiple Assets for the same customer then they will be further sorted by Asset. The sorting can be set to sort largest to smallest or vice versa.
Using this field User can define their own ASSET TYPE order in which the COLLATERAL RIGHTS of a liability will be utilized.
This will overwrite the order (ASCENDING/DESCENDING) specified in the field USE.COLLATERAL. COLLATERAL.RIGHTS with COLLATERAL.CODE
which are not specified in this field will be sorted in the order specified in USE.COLLATERAL field.
Must be a valid COLLATERAL.CODE record id.
NULL – Order mentioned in USE.COLLATERAL field otherwise system default.
